channel.title: Natural Gas STAR Program
channel.description: Updated Natural Gas STAR Program content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Methane Emissions from Transmission and Distribution Pipeline Blowdowns
item.description:
This presentation was given by Justin Pryor (U.S. EPA Methane Challenge Program) at the Technology Transfer Workshop, Pipeline Blowdowns in Transmission and Distribution, held on November 10, 2016 in Houston, Texas.

  • Methane Emissions from Transmission and Distribution Pipeline Blowdowns (PDF)(17 pp, 559 K, November 2016)
item.dc:creator: chris_bachman1

item.title: Case Studies of Methane Blowdown Mitigation Technologies on Pipelines
item.description:
